title: (x) Lippincott/Integrine/Millennium Promise - Locator Display, Gotham {Michael A, Jan E}

Thanks a bunch.

Cheers,  
Vlad

comments.content:
Integrine should be Locator Display Medium

MP\_Old is Gotham from HFJ.
